ValidationRule.description: For the two ATS onboarding case record types, Staging Backend has to be empty to close the case.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed"),
OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = "ATS_New_Onboarding" , RecordType.DeveloperName = "ATS_Create_a_new_Adjust_Campaign" ),
NOT( ISBLANK( Staging_Backend__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Before closing the case, make sure that Staging Backend is empty.
